forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 63, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 8 to 22 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 51. West southwest wind 13 to 22 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

weather_report:
As the sun graces the morning sky over Downtown San Francisco, a refreshing clarity fills the air, gently ushering in a day marked by warmth and a touch of coastal breeze. With temperatures poised to reach around 63 degrees, the chill of the previous night dissipates, revealing a landscape bathed in sunlight. In the afternoon, expect a slight retreat in warmth as the temperature settles near 61, signaling the day’s soft transition. The southwest winds, brisk yet invigorating, weave through the streets at 8 to 22 mph, adding a dynamic touch to the otherwise serene scenery, while gusts may elevate the tempo to 28 mph. 

Tonight, the evening will cradle the city under a quilt of partly cloudy skies, with a comforting low around 51. A west-southwest wind will continue to flutter at similar speeds, ensuring the twilight remains refreshingly cool. For those venturing out, layering is key; a light jacket will keep you cozy against the brisk evening air while comfortable shoes invite spontaneous strolls through the winding streets. Given the pleasant weather, consider enjoying a leisurely walk by the waterfront or a quiet read in one of the city's beautiful parks—an uncomplicated yet fulfilling way to savor the day’s offerings.
